title: How to Make Cat Litter at Home

steps.headline: Shred some newspapers, preferably using a paper shredder, and collect shredded paper in a large bucket or similar container.
Soak the paper in warm water mixed with a few squirt of gentle, biodegradable dish soap.
steps.description: The shredded paper will take on a cooked oatmeal consistency. The paper won’t become completely clean, but the water will turn grey.

steps.headline: Drain the water and repeat the soaking, this time without using soap.
Sprinkle baking soda on the wet paper.
steps.description: Knead it in to the mixture. You might want to wear gloves to avoid getting ink on your hands.

steps.headline: Squeeze the remaining water out until it’s as dry as you can get it.
Crumble over a screen and leave to dry.
steps.description: It will take a few days.

steps.headline: Finished.
steps.description: You have perfect litter for your cat!
